SEARCH

Package Login

package Login
  • Class
    Description
    AccountsInit
    Initializes user accounts by reading data from a CSV file and populating user registries.
    AuthenticationService
    Provides authentication services for patients by verifying user credentials against a CSV file containing patient information.
    AuthStaff
    Provides authentication services for staff members by verifying user credentials against a CSV file and returning the appropriate Staff type (Pharmacist, Doctor, or Admin) based on the role specified in the CSV data.
    ControllerInt
    Interface for handling user choices in various controllers.
    DisplayFormat
    Provides display formatting utilities for console output, including methods to print dividers, center text, and clear the screen.
    DisplayManager
    Manages the display of various screens and messages for the Hospital Management System, including welcome, login, and error screens.
    LoginController
    Manages the login flow and menu choices for the Hospital Management System.
    LoginInt
    Interface for managing login operations.
    LoginManager
    Manages the login process for the Hospital Management System.
    LoginPageMain
    Entry point for the Hospital Management System's login process.
    LoginStrategy
    Defines a strategy for creating a login manager.
    PatientLoginManager
    Manages the login process for patients.
    StaffLoginManager
    Manages the login process for staff members (Pharmacist, Doctor, Admin).
    UserFactory
    Factory class for creating instances of Users based on the specified user type.
    UserRegistry<T extends Users.Users>
    Interface for managing a registry of users.
